DOC.brief_summary: Overactive bladder syndrome ( OAB ) affect around 17 % female population . However , etiology OAB complicate unclear many aspect . In particular , research psychiatric aspect etiology OAB paucity . Besides , research prognostic factor impact cardiovascular system OAB treatment also paucity . Therefore aim investigator study ( 1 ) analyze etiology OAB psychiatric aspect ; ( 2 ) analyze prognostic factor associate tolterodine treatment ; ( 3 ) analyze difference cardiac conduction heart rate variability tolterodine treatment ; ( 4 ) analyze difference arterial stiffness non-OAB OAB female patient , tolterodine treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Studies Psychiatric Predisposing Factors , Treatment-related Cardiovascular Effects , Prognostic Factors Associated With Antimuscarinic Drug ( Tolterodine ) Female Overactive Bladder Syndrome
DOC.criteria: case female patient low urinary tract symptom
